sql: SELECT admin2, SUM(executed) as amount FROM ':memory:' WHERE transfer = 'Excluding transfers' AND year = 2006 GROUP BY admin2
SELECT admin2, econ1, SUM(executed) as amount FROM ':memory:' WHERE transfer = 'Excluding transfers' AND year = 2006 GROUP BY admin2, econ1
SELECT admin2, econ1, econ2, SUM(executed) as amount FROM ':memory:' WHERE transfer = 'Excluding transfers' AND year = 2006 GROUP BY admin2, econ1, econ2
